job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: TITLE: Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer LOCATION: Remote Duration: 8 months+ extensions ***********Must be eligible to work on W2**************** Ideal Qualifications: 5+ Python software development for composition and modularity, debugging and following tracebacks Strong stats background and concepts including hypothesis testing, correlation, R squared, P-value Experience with Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Pytorch Tensorflow functional API, deep learning Mathematics of machine learning- linear algebra, multivariable calculus SQL querying Hyperparameter optimization, regularizing regression models Nice to Have Masters HIGHLY preferred!! Ecommerce experience Responsibilities include: Analyze large data sets by quantifying the data quality, identifying particular patterns, and visualizing results Understand business problems and identify the right data sets and ML/Statistical approach to produce the desired outcomes Adapt to account for changes and be able to propose alternative approaches Ideate and develop analytics and modeling solutions cross-functionally to build customized, long-term, and sustainable solutions Provide critical thought leadership and enhance organizational capabilities Own machine learning pipelines end-to-end Write production-grade machine learning code using standard engineering practices and deploy models to production Improve codebase and lead/participate in code reviews with Research Scientists and Data Scientists Help non-engineers develop their engineering skills Mentor junior team members and contribute to a culture where everyone is valued
